TWiML News

Tübingen WiML Holds Her First Women's Day
March 8, 2024

On a serene day in Tübingen, a new chapter was penned at the Lecture Hall of the AI Bulding, as the community gathered to celebrate the International Women's Day for the first time under TWiML. Intelligent women in machine learning gave talks about their works.
